description.value:
A Pylon that can form part of a network of pylons that when linked in a line form an invisible barrier around an installation. Requires a lot of power, but protects against basic threats. Does 2d10+6 E, Shocking Damage. Good and Best Quality does an additional 1d10.

Effect: Very Rare

Notes: -
